title: Client Won't Launch (Insta-Bugsplat)
body: I got an update when I logged on this morning and now my client bugsplats whenever I try to launch. I've tried the hextech repair tool (which doesn't seems to open after the first run btw). Is a problem I need help please anyone out there. p.s I've tried running as a admin and turned all firewalls off.

replies.body: I have simply deleted all the game files and did a fresh reinstall all was well client was patching and bam. There was an error patching your client (at around 80 percent or so) error 040.
this had happened 3 times in a row now  since the reinstall... - have gone through the crash guide as well earlier

Most of the time those bugsplats are a good sign that some of the game files are damaged. Go through the steps in the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and if all else fails I would try using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
